Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the cost of the new light bulbs by stating that they will cost roughly six times the cost of the light bulbs currently in use.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the assertion that the new light bulbs will cost six times more.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the cost of the new light bulbs is solely based on the upfront cost at the store, without considering the long-term savings in electricity costs.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the cost difference, such as the energy efficiency and longer lifespan of the new light bulbs.
